```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(forecast)
library(readr)
```



```{r}
weather_data <- read.csv("xchange-v1.0.2-115-g6b94+8ef0/data/case1/weather_2022.csv")

# ARIMA Modeling
weather_data_uni <- subset(weather_data, select = -X)

ts_data <- ts(weather_data_uni, frequency = 12)
arima_model <- auto.arima(ts_data)
forecast_data <- forecast(arima_model, h = 5)
plot(forecast_data)
```
```{r}
# Season Decomposition of Time Series
decomp <- stl(ts_data_2, s.window = "periodic", t.window = 12, robust = TRUE)

```

```{r}
# Exponential Smoothing
model <- ets(ts_data, model = "A")
forecast_values <- forecast(model, h = 12)
plot(forecast_values, main = "Exponential Smoothing Forecast")
```
